---
title: Examples
description: Practical examples and code samples
---

# Examples

Here are some practical examples to help you understand the concepts.

## Basic Example

A simple example to get you started:

```tsx
import { Component } from 'library'

export default function App() {
  return <Component />
}
```

## Advanced Example

A more complex example with configuration:

```tsx
import { createApp, configure } from 'library'

const app = createApp({
  plugins: ['auth', 'analytics'],
})

export default app
```
